name: Vampire Collect-a-thon
description:
THIS IS NOT A COMPLETED GAME

Hello! In "Vampire Collect-A-Thon", a person is cursed to find valuable missing treasures for a witch, with death being hardly a barrier. Due to outside circumstances, our team was not able to get far into development as we hoped, so this is a work in progress.

Directions:
  • Move Left and Right with Arrow Keys
  • Jump with Space Bar
  • M to damage/kill player to see different states

CREDITS:

Programming: Rohaid and Sinon (coolguy6316)

3D Models and Environment: Will Leamon and Prajwal "GrazerX"

Fire: Sinon (coolguy6316)

Textures:  jhawkins0040601

Sprites: https://chasersgaming.itch.io/rpg-characer-vampire-nes

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

https://thkaspar.itch.io/tth-animals
